content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Smelting Station at position(0,0)
Consists of two stone furnaces for smelting iron plates:
- Stone furnace at position(0,0)
- Stone furnace at position(2,0)
Both furnaces have coal fuel and are currently idle due to lack of iron ore input.

### Automated Coal Mining Station at position(41,-82)
An automated coal mining setup consisting of:
- Burner mining drill at position(41,-82) mining coal
- Wooden chest at position(41.5,-80.5) collecting mined coal
- Burner inserter at position(41.5,-79.5) oriented upward
The system is operational with the drill actively mining coal and storing it in the chest.

ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Collisions
- Check for existing entities before placing new ones at a location
- When placing entities next to each other, ensure proper spacing and consider entity dimensions
- Use appropriate spacing parameters when using place_entity_next_to function

### Inventory Management
- Ensure required items are in inventory before attempting to craft or place entities
- Keep track of used materials and maintain sufficient resources for planned constructions

### Transport Belt Issues
- Verify you have transport belts in inventory before attempting to connect entities
- When connecting entities with belts, ensure the path is clear and entities are properly spaced

### Entity Insertion Errors
- Verify you have the required items in inventory before attempting to insert them into entities
- Check fuel requirements for burner entities before placement

### Crafting Prerequisites
- Ensure all required ingredients are available before attempting to craft items
- For items requiring machine crafting or smelting, set up appropriate production facilities first

### Entity Configuration
- When setting up automated systems, verify correct orientation of inserters and other directional entities
- Consider the input/output positions of entities when designing automated systems
